ygData.subject: Re: What is the Big Deal Anyway about Plate
ygData.msgSnippet: i ll beat everyone to it. i am sure in this case, banded = plate =) Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr ... From: Lynn Uhlman
ygData.messageBody:
i'll beat everyone to it.

i am sure in this case, banded = plate
=)

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Lynn Uhlman [mailto:uhlmar@...]
Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 10:55 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] What is the Big Deal Anyway about Plate


I have read a lot of debate about if bard should or shouldn't be allowed to
wear banded. Here is my opinion if anyone cares. If you disagree with
banded don't wear it.. (simple as that) there are so many other options for
those of you who disagree with banded.. don't make such a big fuss, just
don't wear it...do something else.
And for those who agree with banded then strap it on.....
Please don't make a mountain out of a mole hill...... HEHE
Enjoy the game, and enjoy being a bard because in my opinion the bard class
is the best class in Norrath....

Humility....lvl 20....humble bard of Qeynos
